fields.description: For Azure blob service endpoint type, select either Default or Custom domain. If you selected **Custom domain, enter the domain for the blob service in this format core.windows.net.
fields.name: AzureServiceEndpoint

fields.description: Specify the Azure Storage account name for cloud witness for your Azure Stack HCI cluster.
fields.name: CloudAccountName

fields.description: The cluster name provided when preparing Active Directory.
fields.name: Name

fields.description: Specify the fileshare path for the local witness for your Azure Stack HCI cluster.
fields.name: WitnessPath

fields.description: Use a cloud witness if you have internet access and if you use an Azure Storage account to provide a vote on cluster quorum. A cloud witness uses Azure Blob Storage to read or write a blob file and then uses it to arbitrate in split-brain resolution. Only allowed values are 'Cloud', 'FileShare'.
fields.name: WitnessType
